titles.title: A bill to enable borrowers of Federal student loans to refinance those loans at interest rates that are equivalent to the interest rates at which the Federal Government provides loans to banks through the discount window operated by the Federal Reserve System.
If It's Good Enough For the Banks, It's Good Enough For Students Act
If It's Good Enough For the Banks, It's Good Enough For Students Act
If It's Good Enough For the Banks, It's Good Enough For Students Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
